question: “Indra 2020” is a bilateral Naval exercise between India and which country?
explanation:
India and Russia have scheduled to conduct bilateral naval exercise, Indra 2020, in the Andaman Sea, close to the Strait of Malacca.
This is the first naval exercise since all such military activities were suspended due to COVID-19. 3 Russian Navy ships and 3 Indian Navy ships are expected to take part in the exercise.
